title: Feedback for new loading screen background
body:
Hi! I'm colorblind, and with that new loading screen background I have a really hard time seeing the loading tips. Words/letters are nearly invisible in the center of the screen. Colorblind mode resolves most of my colorblind-related issues in-game, so this is one thing that sticks out a lot for me.

As far as my type of colorblindness: I see colors like I imagine most other people do, but sometimes they blend together in a weird way, making it so I can't distinguish or identify a specific color often. 

I'd be happy to answer specific questions about that, and I'm not sure what sort of other info a Rioter might want for feedback.

Cheers!

replies.body: We're looking into the making it much easier to see the tips with the loading screen backgrounds, sorry about the inconvenience!

I know this is unrelated, but I'm that desperate guy looking for a Rioter to help him like someone going to the refrigerator section of Best Buy for help with finding a TV.
I've been receiving overwhelming requests to send a lore for one of Riot's skins to them for reading, but I'm not sure where to go for that. Would any of you Reds happen to know?
Try talking to Riot Baconhawk, she works with the skins team.
Ok. How do I get a hold of you guys, though?
Like this? haha, I'm not sure how else you can unless they feel comfortable giving out their emails.
I'll just start a thread and hope I catch the Hawk's eye. Thanks for the help, JxE!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/Riot%20Baconhawk

Try posting on one of these.

We are currently looking at the new loading screen background for a variety of reasons but not specifically from this angle. It's good feedback and we'll have the team take a look at it thru that lens. Thanks.

Hi mate,
I'm not sure it's an issue of being colorblind or not, it's just that's it bright on bright (almost white on white).
So I guess it's hard for anyone, on most screens !

But anyway you're right, it's an issue and has to be fixed ;)

i am not color blind but the messages at the start of the loading screen are even really hard for me to read.

The one i recall trying to read was about blitzcrank and his dating agency, i couldnt really make out what was written.

I am sure the other fun facts and tips that people enjoy reading are going to be equally as hard to read with the new loading screen background as the color i dont think was changed so it doesnt show up like it did on the old black background.
I think the new background is a bit too bright, it kinda bugs my eyes (i have sucky sensitive eyes unfortunately)
